carl.abr.threads

Class Main_thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • carl.abr.threads.Main_thread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ioio.lib.util.IOIOLooperProvider, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Main_thread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ioio.lib.util.IOIOLooperProvider
    Main thread that runs the main loop of the app (run()). Is used to:
    - connect to the server over TCP socket
    - start/stop sensors, camera, and ioio
    - get data from sensors, camera, ioio
    - process data
    - send data over UDP
    - get TCP commands from server
    - set motor command ioio
    See Also:
    #start_tcp()}, {@link #start_sensors()}, {@link #start_camera()}, {@link #start_IOIO()}, {@link #get_sensors_data()}, {@link #get_camera_data()}, {@link #get_ioio_data()}, {@link #send_sensors_data()}, {@link #send_camera_data()}, {@link #send_ioio_data()}, {@link #stop_sensors()}, {@link #stop_camera()}, {@link #stop_IOIO()}

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public final void run()
        Loop of the main thread. This run function is called when: the_main_thread.start(); is called in the Main_activity.

        First, this thread loads the openCV libraries, then connects to the TCP server (start_tcp()).

        Then it collects data from sensors, GPS, camera, IRs (get_sensors_data(), get_camera_data(), get_ioio_data()).

        It then performs some computation (e.g. autonomous behavior), then sends data to the server (send_sensors_data(), send_camera_data(), send_ioio_data()).

        It then checks the status of the TCP connection check_tcp() and read any messages sent over the TCP socket read_tcp().

        Finally, it updates the IOIO motor commands (IOIO_thread.set_PWM_values(float, float)).

        This thread performed video streaming by capturing frames from the camera, which were then converted from YUV to RGB using OpenCV, compressed into JPEG images in get_camera_data(), sliced into UDP packets, and sent over Wi-Fi/3G/4G to the server in send_camera_data().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        #start_tcp()}, {@link #get_sensors_data()}, {@link #get_camera_data()}, {@link #get_ioio_data()}, {@link #send_sensors_data()}, {@link #send_camera_data()}, {@link #send_ioio_data()}

      • stop_thread
